name: Claying Around
description:
your friends have been shaken from the sky and are now scattered around the landscape. you must collect as many friends as possible and return them to the sky. 

Arrow keys to move.

Spacebar to Jump.

Up arrow to float on smoke from candles.

This is the first game I built myself. and the first game jam I have ever done. it's not as polished as I would of liked and and my inexperience definitely shows, but I made all assets myself. all sprites are plasticine and the music is me playing my piano (I am very rusty I apologize)
